kv15.9:1.1_0: And when someone dies on the cessation of perception and feeling, they’ll work.”
kv15.9:1.3_0: And there is someone who has attained the cessation of perception and feeling, burning, blazing, and glowing? And they intention in Māra’s intentions aim, wishes the mind.
kv15.9:1.5_0: And when you have no known the cessation of perception and feeling, burning, blazing, and glowing? Do you intention regarding Māra’s intentions, mind, Māra, and intentions regarding Māra, what is the intentions of Māra?
kv15.9:1.7_0: When there is no Māra, he has entered the cessation of perception and feeling. He knows Māra’s liberation, contact, feeling, perception, intention, mind, and aiming at Māra’s mind. And he doesn’t pull your mind away from Māra’s intention to Māra.

kv15.9:3.1_0: And when someone dies on the cessation of perception and feeling, they’ll work.”
kv15.9:3.3_0: For someone who has attained the cessation of perception and feeling, would they disconect their body?”
kv15.9:3.5_0: For someone who has attained the cessation of perception and feeling, does not burn a fire, and does not light it.
kv15.9:3.7_0: If they had entered the cessation of perception and feeling, they wouldn’t quickly extinguish it, strang it, or knive it.

kv15.9:4.1_0: And when someone dies on the cessation of perception and feeling, they’ll work.”
kv15.9:4.3_0: For someone who has attained the cessation of perception and feeling, would they disconect their body?”
kv15.9:5.1_0: And when someone dies from the cessation of perception and feeling, they don’t work.
kv15.9:5.3_0: And so there’s someone who has entered the cessation of perception and feeling. Wouldn’t they die there?
kv15.9:5.5_0: So he doesn’t fall back to the cessation of perception and feeling.
kv15.9:5.6_0: “I wouldn’t die right here in the cessation of perception and feeling.”
kv15.9:6.3_0: So that’s what they pass away and are not lost.
kv15.9:6.7_0: The third section on the perception of repulsion is finished.
